sentences.english: Apply solution to the tube and allow to become tacky .

sentences.english: New adhesives do not receive ITTF authorisation if they contain volatile organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 含挥发性有机溶剂的新胶水不能得到国际乒联的许可。

sentences.english: Please remember to bring markers and glue next time.
sentences.chinese: 下次请记得带彩色笔和胶水。

sentences.english: Don’t use wood finishes, glues, or spot removers.
sentences.chinese: 不要用木材涂装，胶水或光电消除剂。

sentences.english: In sandpaper, bone glue is actually the glue between the sand and the paper.
sentences.chinese: 砂纸中把砂和纸粘在一起的胶水实际上就是骨胶。

sentences.english: Grab some sandpaper after the glue has dried, and wear down the edge on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 胶水干后准备一些砂纸，把封面的边缘稍稍打磨光滑。

sentences.english: The magic eye can control the gluing system in case of break feeding.
sentences.chinese: 电眼控制断纸胶水的空印等。

sentences.english: Contact cement and other glues do not work.
sentences.chinese: 联系水泥和其他胶水不工作。

sentences.english: You can even buy a type of superglue that comes in two parts.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以买一种由两部分组成的超级胶水。

sentences.english: We can stick these pictures into the book with gum.
sentences.chinese: 我们可用胶水把这几张画粘贴在书里。

sentences.english: It seems our beginnings are the glue that holds us together.
sentences.chinese: 我们的开端是把我们联系在一起的胶水。

sentences.english: The trouble most of us have with glue can't be blamed on the glue-makers.
sentences.chinese: 我们大多数人遇到的胶水问题不能归咎于胶水制造商。

sentences.english: The trouble most of us have with glue can't be blamed on the glue-makers.
sentences.chinese: 我们大多数人遇到的胶水问题不能归咎于胶水制造商。

sentences.english: And that's all, unless we count glue, and linseed oil which I used for finishing.
sentences.chinese: 这一切，除非我们指望胶水，亚麻油，我用来整理。

sentences.english: In the smoking process, squab ( squab ) meat becomes very soft , almost like paste.
sentences.chinese: 在烟熏加工中，雏鸽肉变得软了，几乎象胶水样。

sentences.english: Guo Yue is Olympic Games, before she has not hit the racket which the inorganic glue water sticks.
